steps: Navigate to the dashboard homepage
Verify 'Total Progress' card displays the correct percentage of contacted companies
Verify 'Response Rate' card displays the correct percentage
Verify 'Stalled Items' count shows number of companies not updated in > 7 days
Verify 'Member Activity Monitor' table lists all committee members with their last active time
Verify 'Flagged Items' section shows companies that requested attention

description: Committee Member views their Personal Workspace
steps: Navigate to the Committee Workspace page
Select a 'Committee Member' from the filter/dropdown (or auto-detected)
Verify the Kanban board/list only shows companies assigned to that member
Verify columns exist for: 'To Contact', 'Contacted', 'Negotiating', 'Closed/Rejected'
Verify companies with no updates > 7 days are highlighted (e.g., yellow background)

description: Committee Member updates Company Status via 'Case File' Modal
steps: Click on a company card in the workspace
Verify a Modal opens showing company details
Change status from 'To Contact' to 'Contacted'
Enter a remark: 'Sent initial email'
Click 'Save'
Verify the Modal closes and the card moves to the 'Contacted' column
Verify 'Last Updated' timestamp in Google Sheet is updated to NOW
Verify 'Committee_Status' sheet updates the member's Last Active time to NOW

description: Committee Member adds a new Contact Person
steps: Open Company Modal -> 'Contacts' tab
Click 'Add Contact'
Enter Type (Phone), Name (Jane), Value (555-0199)
Click 'Save'
Verify the new contact appears in the list instantly
Verify a NEW ROW is inserted in the Google Sheet with the same Company Name and Status

description: Admin searches for a company in Master Database
steps: Navigate to 'All Companies' page
Enter a company name in the search bar
Verify the table filters to show only matching companies
Click 'Last Updated' header
Verify the table sorts by date descending
